definition: pleasant lingering effect/memorable stylishness/haunting tune/aftertaste (of a good wine etc)
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound

sentences.english: Persistent blackberries fruits and toasty oak in lingering finish.
sentences.chinese: 持續的黑梅子和烤橡木味令餘韻更爲悠長。

sentences.english: An aromatic nose of ripened fruits, closing with hints of oak.
sentences.chinese: 馥郁的果香芬芳宜人，蘊含幾分橡木的淡淡餘韻。

sentences.english: Rich and elegant wine with jammy cassis fruits in lingering finish.
sentences.chinese: 豐富而優雅葡萄酒，醋栗果漿口感，餘韻悠長。

sentences.english: Finish off the cicada has forests, would go strong to fly back to swallow eaves.
sentences.chinese: 已老林蟬餘韻斷，將歸檐燕強飛回。

sentences.english: In their view, life with the nature of lazy is the aftertaste of the Old Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 在他們看來，慵懶隨性的生活裏透着老上海的餘韻。

sentences.english: In the eyes of Shanghaines, an indolent and loosening life symbolizes Shanghai style.
sentences.chinese: 在上海人看來，慵懶隨性的生活裏透着海派的餘韻。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied red wine with fruity flavors and floral aromas, velvet and round tannins with long after taste.
sentences.chinese: 酒體中性，富果實及花香氣息，口感柔順，餘韻悠長。

sentences.english: The new brand of beer had a nice taste and long aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 這款新的啤酒味道醇厚且餘韻悠長。

sentences.english: The taste is full of cherries and dried dates, good balanced finish.
sentences.chinese: 充滿櫻桃和幹棗味道，餘韻均衡佳。

sentences.english: Very caressing in the mouth, balanced and ends with a long aftertaste of tobacco smokiness .
sentences.chinese: 舌頭被這酒輕撫著，平衡得來並帶著長長的菸絲餘韻。

sentences.english: A long and structured finish with fine tannins.
sentences.chinese: 平衡的酒體和完好的單寧使得餘韻綿長。

sentences.english: New Year fireworks lamp yuanxiao festival finish and exultation.
sentences.chinese: 過年的炮仗元宵的燈喜慶餘韻又歡騰。

sentences.english: Lasting blackcurrant and new oak flavors palate.
sentences.chinese: 持久的黑醋栗和新橡木口感餘韻悠長。

sentences.english: Rich and elegant wine in length.
sentences.chinese: 豐富而優雅葡萄酒餘韻悠長。

sentences.english: Persistent blackcurrants and new oak in length.
sentences.chinese: 持久的黑醋栗和新橡木口感餘韻更悠長。

sentences.english: A touch of acidity and remarkable length in the mouth make a consistently delightful finish.
sentences.chinese: 淡淡的果酸及精緻的餘韻令其回味頗爲悠遠，怡人。

definition: implicit charm in rhyme or sound/hinted appeal/interest
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
